    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2465</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2465</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comment utiliser les adjectifs?</string>
            <string language="en">How adjectives are used</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Adjektive verwendet werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment des adjectifs sont utilisés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os adjetivos são usados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come gli aggettivi sono usati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα επίθετα χρησιμοποιούνται</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre el gènere dels adjectius. Conté una breu presentació i tres apartats: un exercici pràctic, un d'autoavaluació i eines amb un enllaç que conté un quadre explicatiu de la formació del femení.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the gender of adjectives. It includes a brief introduction and three sections: a practice exercise, a self-assessment exercise, and tools with a link to a table with the rules on forming the feminine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">dictat</string>
            <string language="en">dictation</string>
            <string language="es">dictado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
            <string language="es">ejercicio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material interactiu</string>
            <string language="en">interactive material</string>
            <string language="es">material interactivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ortografia</string>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
            <string language="es">ortografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Geschlecht von Adjektiven. Es schließt eine 
kurze Einleitung und drei Kapitel ein: eine Übung, eine 
Selbstbewertung Übung und Hilfsmittel mit einem Link zu einem Tabelle
mit den Richtlinien auf der Formung das weibliche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
le genre des adjectifs. Il inclut une brève introduction et 
trois sections : un exercice pratique, un exercice de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, et outils avec un lien à une table avec les 
règles sur former le féminin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no 
gender dos adjetivos. Inclui uma introdução breve e três 
seções: um exercício de prática, um exercício do 
self-assessment, e ferramentas com uma ligação a uma tabela com as 
réguas em dar forma ao feminine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sul 
genere degli aggettivi. Include una breve introduzione e tre 
sezioni: un'esercitazione di pratica, un'esercitazione di 
valutazione di se stesso e strumenti con un collegamento ad una 
tabella con le regole sul formare il femminile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στο γένος 
των επιθέτων. Περιλαμβάνει συνοπτική εισαγωγή και τρία 
τμήματα: μια άσκηση πρακτικής, μια άσκηση αυτοαξιολόγησης, 
και εργαλεία με μια σύνδεση με έναν πίνακα με τους κανόνες για τη
διαμόρφωση το θηλυκού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diktat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
